statements: SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_status FROM Orders WHERE fulfillment_status='fulfilled';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT order_id, order_status, customer_id FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 5002 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status, fulfillment_status FROM Orders ORDER BY order_status ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Orders WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'pending';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, status FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, status FROM orders WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, os.status_name, c.customer_name FROM orders o JOIN order_status os ON o.status = os.status_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped');
SELECT MAX(order_date) AS latest_order_date, MIN(order_date) AS earliest_order_date FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_amount FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, order_items.product_id, order_items.quantity FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id WHERE order_items.quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, total_price FROM order_items INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE quantity >= 3 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
